data.lyric:
[ti:epiphany]
[ar:Taylor Swift]
[al:folklore]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]epiphany - Taylor Swift (泰勒·斯威夫特)
[00:01.04]Written by：Taylor Swift/Aaron Dessner
[00:02.08]© 2020 TASRM Publishing, administered by：Songs Of Universal, Inc. (BMI), Ingrid Stella Music, administered by SonyATV Tunes LLC (ASCAP)
[00:03.12]All Rights Reserved. Used by Permission.
[00:03.76]Produced by：Aaron Dessner
[00:04.19]Recorded by：Jonathan Low and Aaron Dessner at Long Pond (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:05.59]Vocals recorded by：Laura Sisk at the Kitty Committee Studio (Los Angeles, CA)
[00:06.99]Mixed by：Serban Ghenea at Mixstar Studios (Virginia Beach, VA)
[00:08.07]Engineered by：John Hanes
[00:08.50]Mastered by：Randy Merrill at Sterling Sound (New York, NY)
[00:09.57]Piano, Mellotron, Synthesizers and Electric Guitar by：Aaron Dessner (Hudson Valley, NY)
[00:10.86]Orchestration by：Bryce Dessner (Biarritz, FR)
[00:11.51]Trombone by：Dave Nelson (Bone Hollow Recording; Accord, NY) recorded by Dave Nelson and Benjamin Lanz (Paris, FR) recorded by Benjamin Lanz
[00:13.88]Viola and Violin by：Yuki Numata Resnick (Buffalo, NY) recorded by Kyle Resnick
[00:15.28]Trumpet by：Kyle Resnick (Buffalo, NY) recorded by Kyle Resnick
[00:16.35]Cello by：Clarice Jensen (Brooklyn, NY) recorded by Clarice Jensen
[00:17.43]Drums by：JT Bates (Salon Studio; St. Paul, MN) recorded by JT Bates
[00:32.92]Keep your helmet
[00:37.90]Keep your life son
[00:42.79]Just a flesh wound
[00:48.02]Here's your rifle
[00:55.72]Crawling up the beaches now
[01:00.82]Sir I think he's bleeding out
[01:05.79]And some things you just can't speak about
[01:13.24]With you I serve
[01:15.35]With you I fall down down
[01:23.85]Watch you breathe in
[01:25.53]Watch you breathing out out
[01:33.94]Something med school did not cover
[01:44.10]Someone's daughter someone's mother
[01:57.16]Holds your hand through plastic now
[02:02.10]Doc I think she's crashing out
[02:06.86]And some things you just can't speak about
[02:35.30]Only 20 minutes to sleep
[02:38.55]But you dream of some epiphany
[02:45.51]Just one single glimpse of relief
[02:48.40]To make some sense of what you've seen
[02:55.67]With you I serve
[02:57.73]With you I fall down down
[03:04.95]Down
[03:05.95]Watch you breathe in
[03:07.81]Watch you breathing out out
[03:16.05]With you I serve
[03:18.05]With you I fall down
[03:21.43]Down
[03:22.55]Down
[03:24.95]Down
[03:26.43]Watch you breathe in
[03:28.14]Watch you breathing out out
[03:36.50]Only 20 minutes to sleep
[03:39.74]But you dream of some epiphany
[03:46.76]Just one single glimpse of relief
[03:49.71]To make some sense of what you've seen
